'''''Derailed''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Turning Point}}.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name in Chinese is a reference to the 2008 RTS game {{W|Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3}}. In the game, "[[w:c:cnc:Orbital drop|Orbital drop]]" is one of the Support Powers of the Soviet Union. Depending on level, this protocol can drop a space probe, a satellite, or even a whole space station on target location, an act similar to Ningguang dropping the Jade Chamber on Osial.
